deeptech.title: ETSI issues new Report on Multiple Access Techniques for 6G
deeptech.summary: Published in: News Sophia Antipolis, France, 28 January 2026 ETSI’s Industry Specification Group on Multiple Access Techniques (ISG MAT) has released ETSI GR MAT 001 , a comprehensive study comparing current multiple access techniques in downlink for the physical layer of the 3GPP radio interface with new candidate technologies being considered for 6G.
